amendment.description: Amendment denies Federal courts, in a civil action regarding prison conditions, from entering or carrying out any order that would result in the release or nonadmission of a person subject to incarceration.
amendment.purpose: An amendment no. 16 and printed in Part A of H.Rept. 106-186 to deny Federal courts, in a civil action regarding prison conditions, from carrying out any order that would result in the release of a person subject to incarceration.

vote.text: On agreeing to the DeLay amendment (A016) Agreed to by recorded vote: 296 - 133 (Roll no. 215).
